teams.name: Catholic Kiva
teams.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
teams.description: Anyone is welcome to join our group.  The team is just for fun and to help build community.

teams.name: Kedjan
teams.loan_because: Like the bike chain needs oil to run smoothly so does the world need Kiva.
teams.description:
The swedish word "Kedjan" means "the chain", and relates to the principle of how just a small amount of bike oil may turn a rusty bike chain into a well running one. Our team consider this as the principle for micro loans where a little amount of money can make people self supporting and create a well running business.
How much good can one rusty chain do? :)

teams.name: O.N.E. Gabon
teams.loan_because: Because we are a group of Gabonese citizens and Gabonese aficionados who believe in the power of entrepreneurship and innovation to increase the quality of life in the developing nations.
teams.description: We are citizens of Gabon who want to use our professional passions to help Gabonese entrepreneurs achieve their goals.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Paige Family and friends
teams.loan_because: Every little bit helps
teams.description: a group of family and friends thats trying to make a difference one person at a time

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Warriors Making A Difference
teams.loan_because:
"If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion."

-Dalai Lama
teams.description:
A team of compassionate online entrepreneurs trying to make a difference and positive impact on the lives of other entrepreneurs across the world!

To everybody who purchased LinkedIn Client Attraction, thank you for making a difference!

teams.name: Dermalogica Finance FITE Team
teams.loan_because: We believe in the multiplier effect of supplying capital to women - supporting a woman in opening or growing a business enables her to buy food and housing for her family, send her children to school, and contribute to the welfare of her community. We want to help put more women on the road to financial independence through entrepreneurship. Join FITE!
teams.description: Our Team is one that recognizes the need to give back. This is an opportunity for us to give back globally and to change the life of someone who we may never meet but letting her know that we care. Join FITE with us!

teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!

teams.loan_because: As travelers we have seen poverty first hand and are committed to making the world a better place for all.
teams.description: Travelers who collect miles and points and seek free flights, hotel rooms and upgrades where possible. Here we seek to give back and invite everyone to join with us and make a difference.

teams.description: A team of high school students ages 14-18 coming together to plan fundraisers for the amazing cause of relieving poverty in the third-world.

teams.name: Research Now
teams.loan_because: We are commited to creating a better world and making a positive difference. We strive to be socially responsible and contribute to the welfare and interests of the greater society in which we operate.
teams.description: A global leader in permission-based digital data collection and reporting.

teams.name: MoreWaggyTails,Less Barks&Growls
teams.whereabouts: Dog Lovers hearts (and cat lovers, too!)
teams.loan_because: We  wish humans would be more like our pet dogs. Warm, giving, loving unconditionally. And able to be independent and self-sufficient like our cats!
teams.description:
We want to show wags and encouragement more than growls. Want homes to be an oasis for returning workers. We want to lend instead of spending money on another chew toy or treat. Good workers deserve helping hands and good paws(pause). Dog owners, kitty companions, animal lovers, and pet friends are welcome! [Send the names of your pets - not just dogs - to post here:]
Our Fluff Buddies: Fella, Willie Wonka, Happy, Charlie, Bear, Polly, Lyla, Winnie, Georgio, Edie, Mei Mei, Bugsy, Shasta, Cody, Alma, Lukie,Duchess the BullDog, Latte and Lexi, Chai,  Georgia, Joy, Leila, Bosley, Emma, Page, Nigel, Gwendolyn, Spenser, Lena, Percy, Jasper, Riley, Philipe, Reno Sweeney, Madelaine, Sparkle and Pascal, Buba and Bella, Tmatira, and Iffy the wonder dog. 
Also doggie friendly cats: Fred the Cat, Spike, Missy (also known as Barfy), Tilly, Cherry, Jona, Paulette, Awaremi, Manx, Basheera, Spook and Spick, Pocket, Marty, Jubal, Dunster, Sua, Sadie, Mikie, Mary Chestnut, Friendly, much-loved Moose. 
(Take a look at our fun members' page!)

teams.description: We love the land of Egypt not only because we are residents of this land but Egypt is the land of peace and civilization that belongs to nearly everyone around the world. Together we can make a difference.

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: Team Sanergy: Sanitation for All
teams.loan_because: 2.6 billion people, or 40% of the world, lack access to basic sanitation. The resulting disease causes nearly 2 million deaths, 10% of the global disease burden, and $84 billion in worker productivity loss each year. The high population density combined with the lack of infrastructure and resources makes the problem particularly acute in slums, where populations will double to 2 billion by 2030. Kenya is at the epicenter of this crisis with 10 million people living in slums, 80% of whom lack access to basic sanitation.
teams.description:
Members of Team Sanergy: Sanitation for All enjoy seeing Sanergy's Fresh Life Operators receive loans for, and operate their Fresh Life Toilet businesses in Kenya.

Sanergy promotes the fundamental human right to sanitation in the slums of Kenya by increasing access to and usage of hygienic sanitation facilities. Sanergy creates an efficient, equitable, and sustainable sanitation cycle by building a dense network of small-scale sanitation centers across the slums, a low-cost containerized waste collection infrastructure, and converting this waste at a central processing facility into electricity, fertilizer, and other high-margin products.

Sanergy is an official Kiva field partner.

teams.name: Navy
teams.loan_because: Our duties have brought us to many third world nations and we have seen first hand how a few dollars can make a major difference.
teams.description: We're just a group of sailors that want to give back and help people.

teams.name: ironguides Lending Community
teams.loan_because: We are grateful for our good fortune and recognize that inequality exists in this world. We understand that providing tools for improvement helps to instill confidence, optimism and sharing in the global community. We believe that we can contribute directly to increased global prosperity and well-being.
teams.description:
Our team believes in the ethical and non-egoistic pursuit of sport for self-development and personal growth. By providing great coaching and mentoring advice in a collaborative, mutually supportive environment, we promote collaboration ahead of competition. We celebrate the human spirit by promoting personal growth and helping our athletes set meaningful goals to hone their resilience, persistence, equanimity and personal awareness. 

through effective, down-to-earth training approaches. We believe that the true measure of sucess is the hurdles that have been overcome. By supporting Kiva, we foster personal growth by supporting a sharing, caring environment that promotes greater self-confidence, self-reliance and self-development.

teams.name: Kedjan
teams.loan_because: Like the bike chain needs oil to run smoothly so does the world need Kiva.
teams.description:
The swedish word "Kedjan" means "the chain", and relates to the principle of how just a small amount of bike oil may turn a rusty bike chain into a well running one. Our team consider this as the principle for micro loans where a little amount of money can make people self supporting and create a well running business.
How much good can one rusty chain do? :)

teams.name: Pakistani Visionaries
teams.loan_because:
We have a vision of a progressive and economically sound Pakistan. We have vision of a free country where development is driven by entrepreneurship and innovation. We believe in providing the poor with the  opportunity to improve their standard of living. We believe in empowering women to be economically productive and to earn the reward of their entrepreneurial ventures. We have witnessed the desperate poverty that the majority of our fellow countrymen live in and we refuse to stand on the sidelines and let that continue. 

We believe our collective efforts can make a dent in the abject poverty that plagues Pakistan.

We believe we have the power to change the world.

teams.loan_because:

www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik

We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Pennsylvania
teams.description: We are fans of Pennsylvania, either by living, vacationing, or have friends or family that live in the Keystone State.

teams.name: Olympia Fields Dental Associates
teams.loan_because: We treat patients everyday and understand the truest meaning of the word "help."  So, we loan to help create a life better than what we have for the next generation...
teams.description: A group of dentists, staff, and friends that truly care about helping out those who need a lending hand.

teams.name: Dog Lover Lenders
teams.loan_because: Dog lovers are naturally compassionate people who like to help pets and people. Dogs rule, mutts welcome!
teams.description: We love dogs.

teams.name: Republicans help
teams.loan_because: We want to support enterprising indivuals who understand the value of working to achieve a self sufficient and finacially stable lifestyle.
teams.description: The team has started to further the financial advantages we have enjoyed as Republicans.

teams.name: Libertarian Team
teams.loan_because: As libertarians, we favor voluntary charity over government force to bring about positive change.
teams.description: The libertarian philosophy is one of personal and economic freedom.  We advocate charity and free-markets over government coercion and force.

teams.name: Wine Lover's/ Amantes del Vino
teams.loan_because: Giving to others is one of the most significant steps to achieve happiness. We are a group of people, who has a passion for life, who believes that there is goodness in the world and that we all, together, can make of this world a better place. By giving out loans we help small business and their families to succeed, since family is the basis and most important part of our society. We hope our loans change people's lives, we want to contribute to create a world of better opportunities for a better future and a better life.
teams.description: This project has started in California a blessed land of opportunity. Vineyards, Wine Clubs, grape's growers, wine tasting clubs and wine lover's in general, have decided to support other small business owners around the world , who may don't find help in large banking institutions, but are there waiting for a friendly hand to support them in making a living or their dreams come true. A Vineyard was also once a dream in a man's mind, then started with small grape plants, hard work , patience and dedication, his aspirations appeared, it became a vineyard able to produce delicious wine to bring friends together, either for a celebration or just because sharing a glass of wine with a friend is one the better splendors that life has to offer. We want to help to make others around the world successful and happy and to let them know that they are not alone, that there is a big group of wine lovers who believe in them and are willing to support their dreams so that they will become true.

teams.name: Portuguese Water Dogs Love to Give
teams.loan_because: PWDs are loving, energetic, helpful creatures who think they are human and care so deeply about their people. They just love to help
teams.description: Anyone who loves dogs and cannot imagine a world without such devoted friends

teams.loan_because: We help our neighbours and friends

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Ed's 40th Birthday!
teams.description: We are friends & family of Ed Briscoe, celebrating his 40th birthday by participating in his passion for microfinance.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Ed's 40th Birthday!
teams.description: We are friends & family of Ed Briscoe, celebrating his 40th birthday by participating in his passion for microfinance.

teams.name: Help for Tanzania
teams.loan_because: We want to help the beautiful people of Tanzania to work toward the future they deserve.
teams.description: People who wish to help those living in the country of Tanzania.

teams.name: Inspiration
teams.loan_because: We are all members of the same world family.
teams.description: There are many roads leading to the same destination. We are inspired by sages and mystics from many different traditions.

teams.name: Team California
teams.loan_because: Our state rules and we care about the world around us!
teams.description: We are from the great state of California!

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: One
teams.loan_because: Sometimes our voice isn't enough. We have to show the poor our concern through our actions.
teams.description: We are a diverse group of people from all around the world who are united, as one, against extreme poverty.

teams.name: Women For Women International
teams.loan_because: We are supporters of Women For Women International (WFWI), which helps women survivors of war rebuild their lives.  Some of us are sponsors of "sisters" who are learning life skills, job skills, and rights training through WFWI.
teams.description: We lend especially to women entrepreneurs in countries where WFWI works to help women survivors of war rebuild their lives:  Afghanistan, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Iraq, Nigeria, Rwanda, and Sudan.

teams.name: Team Pavlina
teams.loan_because: We're creating a more conscious and empowered world, for the highest good of all.
teams.description: Conscious people who care

teams.name: Zac's friends
teams.loan_because: it's an efficient way to help people who have no access to credit, to grow their business and have a better life.
teams.description: We are a team made up of friends and families. We invite people that we know and trust to join the Zac's friends team.

teams.name: ThrowGive
teams.loan_because: We realize the power of transportation to bring communities together.
teams.description: Mobilizing people.

teams.name: ThrowGive
teams.loan_because: We realize the power of transportation to bring communities together.
teams.description: Mobilizing people.

teams.name: GCO&T Investment Group
teams.loan_because: Micro finance is an important source of capital for those who do not have access to conventional banking.
teams.description: Operations and Technology Executives lending to learn more about micro finance and Kiva.

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Guys holding fish
teams.loan_because: We feel an affinity for entrepreneurs that make their living by fishing, selling fish, or attempting to make their lives better because of their proximity to the ocean, or freshwater locales...
teams.description:
We love fish and/or fishing so much that many of us have chosen to present ourselves on KIVA with a photo of ourselves, holding a fish!  We welcome "gals" to join, as well, the name of the team notwithstanding...  

We certainly support "sustainable" fishing, but also recognize that sometimes, our "Western" views of resource management may not match the needs of the very desperate folks, in other countries, struggling to make a living, or even providing food for their families ...  Our intent is to help the struggling, without regard to their profession or trade.  We believe that our lending record well represents that goal, as we are a pretty diverse group, with very diverse lending interests....

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.

teams.name: PRMconnect
teams.loan_because: We believe that part of being a responsible corporation is giving back to other businesses as they get started.
